column4: this Xchat is stuck I cannot get the toolbar to reappear with the view options channel login etc can some one help me please?
you can access it from the menu, it's set up so that it opens when you open xchat, unless you click the box to set it not to open when you open xchat
that's the channel options, you must have unchecked the menu display in view options, I'm not sure how you undo that
